title: Methodology
summary: Manual, human-first API testing focused on logic, authorization, and business-process integrity across logistics workflows.
focus_areas: Business-logic abuse (quotes, BOL edits, cancellations, visibility)
Focused injection testing (SQLi, NoSQLi, command injection, template injection)
OWASP Top 10 coverage (API Top 10 + web app OWASP where applicable)
Data leakage and sensitive data exposure

how_we_test.name: Recon (human-first)
how_we_test.description: Explore UI and available docs to build a mental map of flows (quotes, BOLs, booking, billing, tracking).

how_we_test.name: Instrument
how_we_test.description: Capture requests with Burp/Postman, log identifiers, cookies, tokens, headers, and session transitions.

how_we_test.name: Traverse endpoints
how_we_test.description: Methodically call endpoints with valid contexts, then alter identifiers/parameters to observe differences in behavior.

how_we_test.name: Focused injection tests
how_we_test.description: Targeted payloads for SQLi, NoSQLi, template and command injection against inputs that influence business logic or persistence.

how_we_test.name: Analyze responses
how_we_test.description: Inspect status codes, response bodies, error messages, side-effects, and downstream behavior that indicate missing checks.

how_we_test.name: Prioritize by impact
how_we_test.description: Rank findings by attacker ease and business impact (revenue, shipments, trust) for triage and remediation.

how_we_test.name: Report & remediate
how_we_test.description: Deliver concise findings with repro steps, exact request/response examples, mapping to business flows, and practical fixes.

rules_of_engagement.manual_first: No noisy crawling or mass scanning; every test is purposeful and human-directed.
rules_of_engagement.production_safe: Avoid disruptive automation; coordinate tests that could impact production and enforce rate limits.
rules_of_engagement.ethical_scoped: Only test within agreed scope and authorization; share clear reproduction steps and remediation suggestions.

deliverables.remediation: Actionable, prioritized remediation guidance engineers can implement.
